name: HMTextView
summary: HMTextView is a configurable textview which can detect and link @ and #.
description: 'HMTextView is a configurable textview which can detect and link @ and #. You can just set your class to HMTextView and start using it with default values. Also you can udpate text attributes, link text attributes and link fonts. You can add hashtag or mentions by selection from anywhere. Protocol functions will return you the hashtags and mentions you entered at the end.'
